## 2. Trophic diversity indices (Cucherousset et al, 2015)

### Z0508 - 25m

-   Variation coefficients (intraspecific variability)

```{r}
#| echo: false
targets::tar_load(individuals_si_Z0508)
targets::tar_load(species_status_biomass_Z0508)
targets::tar_load(di_Z0508)
kableExtra::kbl(di_Z0508)

```
